page.title: 12My Life Today.9 years
page.content: It is a nice life here in Harpsden in 1985.Every day we go to School to learn things.We have been going out in the minibus,which we share with two other Schools,and in cars to visit the Area for our Domesday Project.We are also making a Book on the Middle Ages for Tudor 500.We have visited Henley to see a tenth scale working section of a Greek Trireme.We all had a go at moving the heavy oars.We drew pictures and met the Designer who is sending the boat to Greece.I like eating fish and chips and riding around on my bike.I have a pet dog called Meg and a mouse called Smudge.Every morning and evening I walk the dog and Mum does too.We moved here recently from a smaller School in Derbyshire.My sister,Anna,has two cats and she will be going to the Secondary School in September.My house is next to the School.It was once a laundry.
